name: Mini Cherry Cheese Cakes
author: Doris Moore
instructions: Soften cream cheese to room temperature. Blend cheese, sugar, eggs and vanilla until smooth and creamy. Line muffin tins with cup- cake wrappers. Place vanilla wafer in each bottom. Fill each cup with cheesecake mixture, about 3/4 full. Bake at 325Â° for 20 minutes. Cool and top with your favorite pie filling.
